questions.question: Considering the overall rectangular shape and packaging design, what is the primary material of this product's container?
Observing the prominent label, what is the main ingredient indicated for this product?
Based on the textual information on the packaging, what is the stated weight of the product?
Examining the color scheme of the packaging, what is the predominant color on the primary label?
Judging by the text on the package, what is the designated use of this product, as specified by the manufacturer?
Considering the image of the product, what is the general shape of the packaging?
Looking at the logo on the packaging, what is the brand name clearly visible on the product?
Considering the product description and the image, what is the product's form factor?
What secondary color is prominently used in the background of the packaging design, besides the primary label?
Based on the visual detail of the packaging, what is the surface texture of the primary package?
Judging from the label's design and the product itself, what is the product's grade classification?
Considering the visible text on the packaging, what specific term is used to describe the product material?
What is the general appearance of the text on the package, in terms of design and style?
Looking closely at the side of the box, what other markings are present, besides the main label and brand logo?
Based on the image, what is the overall condition of the product's packaging, considering any visible damage or wear?
